website_summaries.verdict: When your pot needs a little lift this stand is perfect. Simple yet effective. Offers great value for money.
pros: A simple, attractive plant stand that's made from rust-proof coated iron
Perfect for lifting your pot from the floor to prevent dampness
cons: May not be study enough to support very heavy pots

customer_reviews.title: The better use of this stand may be to raise a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic plant stand - nothing fancy. I purchased it with the intent of having my shorter plant appear taller, fuller, and allude a more attractive and appealing presence in the room.. However, the plant stand hardly lifts the pot off the floor. There is very little difference between the height of my plant on the floor versus it being on the plant stand. At most, it lifted my plant less than 3 inches higher than it original floor position. The better use of this stand may be to raise a planter/pot off the floor to keep it from soiling a floor or creating a ring on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy for heavy plants
customer_reviews.text: It works great it got my plant off the floor and it is a heavy plant. I have hard wood floors and my plant was leaving a round spot on the wood so got the plant stand. It looks very classy in my office and make the plant more noticeable. Excuse the tag I forgot to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable plant stand. It gave my yucca tree the perfect amount of height. It’s very sturdy as well. My potted plant weighs about 30lbs total and it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely91

customer_reviews.title: Simple, understated form and function.
customer_reviews.text: Simply elegant in design and function. Sturdy build, excellent fit and finish ... gets plant off floor and focuses attention on it. Great solution to clean up overloaded window ledges and seats and distribute the beauty throughout other areas of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Justharry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy "trivets"
customer_reviews.text: Used three of these all last summer. They are very sturdy. Supported some very, very heavy hibiscus plants and planters. Held up well during both heat and rain. Were fairly easy to move around. Seem to be well-made with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand that fits in nicely with my Nearly Natural 5263-03 Areca Palm Decorative Silk Tree. It looks very premium with my fake plant. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas E. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: It's a plant stand, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Jasmine sambac vine in an 8" pot. I just needed to lift it a couple inches off a wood floor, for both light as well as to protect the floor. This stand fit the bill perfect. Ornate, but not overly so as to distract from the plant, and large enough to comfortable fit the pot without too much 'overhang'. Not sure how else to review a plant stand: It's functional, it looks just like the picture, it stands a plant. 5/5 :)
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for to raise a potted plant off the floor a little bit. The dimensions are exactly what is listed and it's very sturdy. Has no trouble or bend when holding up a heavy pot & plant.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Potted plants off the ground....
customer_reviews.text: I wantd to get my potted plants directly off my patio since the pots were staining the floor. This works beautifully. Also can use to elevate a potted plant when planning a group of different plants in the same area.
customer_reviews.author: English Myst

customer_reviews.title: It arrived well packed and in good condition is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The iron plant supporting is just what I needed for some small plant pots that I wanted to display on my desk. It fits the pot I have perfectly and has some sort of coating on the stand itself to prevent rusting. It arrived well packed and in good condition is exactly what I needed. They are perfect for my purposes, and look good, well made; I will surely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for two medium-sized pots, but they were sturdy enough to hold the larger ones that I had sitting nearby. I love when something is actually better than you expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Heenan

customer_reviews.title: Sits level, no wobble.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to elevate a heavy Money plant that sits on my patio to provide drainage. This does the job. There was no tipping when I placed the plant. This is supposed to be rust proof, time will tell. I've noticed these reviews are for three different plant stands. I provided a photo of the plant stand this review is for.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Don't think I want to buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Originally plan to buy two more if it looks good. However, not sure whether I got the defected product, the four legs of the stand are not even, so the plant stand is wobbly. I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy pots
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking stand, however it looks like you can put a large potted plant on it, it may not with stand the weight. My pot doesn't fill the stand and the legs of the stand want to bow out.
customer_reviews.author: Unshakble

customer_reviews.title: Nice plant stands
customer_reviews.text: Love theses plant stands. Very sturdy and nice looking. I purchased additional ones after getting the first ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Metal Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: Quality of item was great. Very strong and steady. I bring in plants as it gets cold and it is holding a plant in a ceramic container, no problems. I brought in a small budda statue and decided to switch items. It fit perfectly and I will probably put budda and stand outside again next spring. Very good quality. Will probably order another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PLB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and it is just perfect for a planter. It is made very good and looks nice under the plant.
customer_reviews.author: V Webb

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal, sturdy, pretty and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 different black plant stands and I am only keeping this set! They are pretty and seem sturdy! I placed 2 good size, pretty heavy pots on them and they are holding up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one a couple years ago. It’s still looks like new. It’s been outside year round. Recently I bought the double pack. Incredible value. Going to buy another set. Big enough and strong enough for large plants and pretty enough to be exposed for smaller plants.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Swack

customer_reviews.title: Great lifts mt Potts
customer_reviews.text: Lifts my pots up off the ground to allow water to drain but not too high that the wind blows my ceramic Potts to break

customer_reviews.title: My little geranium has a new home & he is delighted!
customer_reviews.text: My little geranium was just setting on my concrete porch until I purchased this lovely plant stand. Now the geranium is so happy to have such a beautiful home. He smiles all day long and is blooming more and more every day. I am delighted that I purchased this plant stand.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great plant stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand works wonderfully!!! It’s holds up great for a large plant and adds the best touch to the look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love the details. Nice height. Will buy more. Fast shipment, good packaging

customer_reviews.title: Attractve, sturdy, level.

customer_reviews.text: Works great for large potted plants. Already survived hurricane Laura, lol. Would give it a 5 star, but I think it's a bit overpriced.

customer_reviews.title: The plant stand is as attractive as it is functional..and it's being sold at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very heavy dracaena marginata that needed to be off of my rug, as it was really not standing up very straight because of its weight, and I needed to move the plant once in awhile, even just rotate it with the sun...the stand makes it much easier for me to do both. I highly recommend this product...it does the job...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miller

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleasantly surprised by how sturdy and decorative this plant stand is
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by how sturdy and decorative this plant stand is. This stand is far superior to my older one ( from another manufacturer ) that only lasted a few years. I have no doubt I will be enjoying this plant stand for many, many years :)

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Nice Quality, Classy Look
customer_reviews.text: Holds my large potted plants with ease. No putting anything together, just open and place. Look great. I would buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well
customer_reviews.text: I had thought the metal wire would be a bit thicker, but I bought 4, and they sat under very heavy pots (30+lbs) all summer, and are still in great shape. They keep the plants off the deck do moss doesn't grow, and look nice.

customer_reviews.title: Lhigh quality look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. High quality look, perfect height just to get off the floor.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple stand to put a potted plant on, this stand the job I was hoping for. It is broad enough to accommodate a variety of sizes and it stable enough to fit a larger pot with a fair amount of soil and weight.

It's only a few inches off the ground but I was just tired of using plastic plant holders on my wood floors. You really can't go wrong with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: These plant stands were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased these plant stands to hold outdoor plants on our deck. They are the perfect size and height for most potted plants. They allow for the water to exit the bottom of the pot without being trapped on the deck by the pot. It keeps our deck looking good and clean. We were very pleased with them.

product_meta.title: Amagabeli 10 inch Metal Potted Plant Stand Rustproof Iron Art Flower Pot Holder Rack Steel Short Planter Supports Trivet Floor Saucer Decorative Garden Pots Containers Stand Black
product_meta.description:
Size:1 pack 10"SIZE & RUSTPROOF MATERIAL: 10 inch diameter round metal potted plant stand indoor which is a perfect size for corner plant pots, balcony flower pot stand, planter saucers or holders. Indoor pot plant stand for living room is perfect for elevating big and medium pots just a few inches above the ground. Flower pot holder is made of powder coated iron, so this steel planter supports can be used for both indoor and outdoor durably, on floor, deck, patio, lawn and garden, no rust anywhere.

STABLE & STURDY: the plant stands indoor is welded with high quality iron thick wires that makes it can bear heavier plants pots or other planters. This house floor plant holder for living room is of an architectural structure that is durable and sturdy. This outdoor plant saucer is designed with 4 supporting points which will make flower pots stand stably. This cast iron plant trivet is perfect for larger planters.

FLOOR PROTECTING & DECOR: black metal short planter stand is with the smooth and curved pegs, no more worry that your expensive floor may be worn out. Decorative iron art plants stand with aesthetic design adds a stylish and nature touch to your home. This indoor decorative plants stand is perfect to get the plants off the ground without distracting from the beauty of the plant and pot.

UED FOR POTTED PLANTS DRAIN & BEVERAGE DISPENSERS: planters stand indoor gets the pots off the floor or ground so lets the water drain and won't ruin the grass or make the wooden floor go moldy. This flower pot holder can be used as a beverage dispenser stand. This outdoor plant stand is nice for large beverage dispensing jug with a spigot. This steel plant stand is tall enough to get cups under the spout to pour the drinks.

USED FOR INDOOR AND OUTDOOR：This indoor potted plants stand for living room can be widely used indoor and outdoor for garden pots, large vases, potted plants and and beverage dispensers.
